price: Oni su svoje zakletve kao štit uzeli, pa od Allahova puta odvraćaju. Ružno je, doista, kako postupaju.
arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
